Actions.Text: REFERRED TO LIBRARIES AND EDUCATION TECHNOLOGY
REPORTED REFERRED TO WAYS AND MEANS

Votes.VoteType: Favorable refer to committee Ways and Means

Title: Requires the state librarian to provide guidance on the curation of library material to all school library systems
Summary: Requires the state librarian to provide guidance on the curation of library material to all school library systems.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring the state librarian to provide guidance on the curation of library material to all school library systems
